modules.description: Provides functions to create and evaluate glob patterns, including matching against file extensions. Works with string-based glob patterns and returns boolean matches. Used to filter files by name or extension in build systems or file search utilities.

Provides functions to match file paths against glob patterns, including support for recursive directory traversal and pattern expansion. Works with strings representing file paths and lists of file system entries. Enables precise filtering of files during build processes or directory scans.

Offers functions to construct and evaluate glob patterns, enabling precise file matching based on names or extensions. It handles string-based patterns and returns boolean results, supporting tasks like filtering files in build processes. Operations include pattern creation, extension-based matching, and general name comparison. Examples include identifying all `.ml` files or excluding temporary files during a search.
